dict.string: A Small Change in Input Results in a drastic change in Hash Output
Hash Based Message Authentication. It Uses a Key to sign the hashvalue which can be authenticated later
The Output of a One-Way Hash Function like SHA
A Cryptographic System which uses a pair of keys namely Public Key and Private Key to encypt and decrypt our Data.
A Small Prime number shared over the Public Network(Insecure Channel)
Random Data that is used as an additional input to a one-way function that hashes data.
A Piece of data only known to the parties invlolved shared in a secure communication
A way of sending messages anonymously to a recipient given its public key and the reciever can decrypt these messages using its Private key
